title: Client issues
body: Are people having the same trouble as I am with this client where it doesn't even let me play where it says internet down or files have not scanned....when are they going to fix these issues....getting annoying

replies.body:
At the time you posted this, I'm not aware of any issues that occurred server-side. If you're seeing connection error messages, I'd recommend you work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure there aren't any local network settings affecting your ability to connect.

Let me know if this caused any change.

I'm having these issues as well.

reinstalled game but it wont get past apply patch. stuck at 41%

First, it demanded, restart or shutdown.  I used your repair tool which did nothing at all except give me logs. I had to manually put league back in the accepted programs. even though there was an option to do it in the repair tool.  Also, when i check the clean uninstall, that didnt work either.

I'll check on it again in the morning but i have been troubleshooting for hours(6). with no reply to my ticket either.

Oh it got to 42% only took 20 minutes lol :p.

Internet works.
